patthana22.19:4.1: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.19:4.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.19:5.1: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.19:5.3: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekādasa … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke pannarasa … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
